data.oai_dc:dc: INRA groups its collections of yeast, filamentous fungi, human and animal pathogenic bacteria, and food and plant associated bacteria into five sites which together make up the International Centre for Microbial Resources (CIRM). This biological resource centre (BRC) is dedicated to the conservation and enhancement of microbial biodiversity.MySql-PHP DatabaseHemiascomycetous yeast|854 occurrences
